description_welcome: Luftio is a data-driven air quality monitoring system, that helps companies improve their workspace and make their employees healthier and also more productive.
sign_up_heading: Start to improve your work environment!
sign_up_message: Join other companies that care about employees and their health.
sign_in_message: Please sign into your Luftio account.
new_password_message: We will be happy to help you get back into your account.
verification_heading: We have sent you an activation email.
verification_message: Confirm your email address. If you did not get your email, check your spam folder.
instructions_message: Please check your inbox and follow them.
set_new_password_message: Quick tip: there are many tools for managing your passwords. Try using one.
msg_invalid_password: Password must be at least 12 characters long and contain a lowercase and an uppercase letter
